page.title: 09FARMING
page.content:
It is an arable farm and the 385 acres are divided into fields of barley, wheat, potatoes and carrots. Farm machinery includes six tractors ,fork lift truck, combine harvester and other implements. Potatoes are sorted and bagged on the farm.
Fenton Barns owns 700 acres of land on which is grown wheat,spring barley potatoes and grass.They produce 200,000 turkeys per year,11000 pigs per year,six tons of mushrooms picked by hand every week,28000-30000 partridge poults per year.They also have 8000 egg laying hens and they fatten 200 cattle every year for market. Fenton Barns also has a shop and they sell turkey products,eggs and potatoes.
